root.name: Eco Phantoms
root.description: After six years away from Earth your delivery contract is complete and you've been paid a fat cheque. As your ship gets closer to Earth your anticipation of seeing the blue planet mounts. You arrive at Earth only to see a grey husk! It's a huge alien mothership sucking away all of Earth's natural resources.You must get down to Earth and reserve the process before it's too late!
